mdRecord.dcterms:title: Stethoscope stems
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: G. P. Pilling and Son (Philadelphia, Pa.) [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 2 stethoscope stems. One is stamped with the text: "Sprague Bowles, Patent 1708398; G.P. Pilling & Son Co., Phila." and includes 2 different sound collectors which allow the health provider to listen to a range of sounds without changing instruments. Patent application granted 1929.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Stethoscopes
